content: anna boichenko p a t t e r n owl in love toy materials and tools any colour himalaya dolfin baby or yarn art dolce 100g - 120 m super bulky i use hook 4 5 mm it s better to take a smaller size than the one recommended for yarn red yarn for eyes yellow for beak and paws toy stuffing hollofiber filling scissors good mood owl the size of the finished toy 14 cm - 5 5 january 2023 aannnnaa bbooiicchheennkkoo attention this pattern is an author s product which may not be copied resold or transferred to third parties in whole or in part you are free to sell your finished product thank you for your understanding and respect friends i am from ukraine and english is not my first language please be kind if you find a typo or mistake thank you hi my dear friend thank you so much for your attention to my artistic work my name is anna boichenko and i love knitting and crocheting crochet is a pure magic the thread and hook in your hands bring the toy to life i invite you to a wonderful world -the world of crocheted toys creativity is contagious pass it on albert einstein january 2023 aannnnaa bbooiicchheennkkoo translation stitches magic_ring- magic_ring chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet repeat - repeat decrease - decrease two crochets stitched together increase - increase two crochets in one loop *х - what s in parentheses you have to crochet x times number - total number of crochets/chains in a row january 2023 aannnnaa bbooiicchheennkkoo owl crochet in continuous rounds row 1 - 7 single_crochet in magic_ring 7 row 2 - increase - repeat 7 14 row 3 - 1 single_crochet increase repeat 7 21 row 4 - 2 single_crochet increase repeat 7 28 row 5 - 3 single_crochet increase repeat 7 35 row 6 - 35 single_crochet 35 row 7 - 3 single_crochet decrease repeat 7 28 row 8 - 28 single_crochet 28 9 - 10 row - 28 single_crochet 28 row 11 - 2 single_crochet decrease repeat 7 21 row 12 - 21 single_crochet 21 row 13 - 1 single_crochet decrease repeat 7 14 crochet heart eyes red yarn round 1 working into the magic loop single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 chain 1 slip_stitch 1 chain 2 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 chain 2 pull tight slip_stitch into the first single_crochet made cut the yarn and leave long tail for sewing stuff the toy with staffing material fold the both parts together and crochet 7 single_crochet do not cut the yarn turn first ear - *chain 3 slip_stitch in the same stitch chain 5 slip_stitch in the same stitch chain 3 slip_stitch in the same stitch* 5 slip_stitch second ear - *chain 3 slip_stitch in the same stitch chain 5 slip_stitch in the same stitch chain 3 slip_stitch in the same stitch* fasten_off and cut the ends sew eyes embroider beak and
